extendedInfo.description: A beautiful and fun puzzle game set in a kingdom above the clouds with over 60 levels of which you can try 13 levels in this free version!Kings Can Fly will soon have your brain sweating as you try to fly the King through his maze-like kingdom. You need a good eye and sharp wits to navigate the towering mountains, spiked gates and dangerous whirlwinds you encounter on the way.Features:* 13 challenging puzzles* Cute and colorful 3D graphics* Adorable airships* Original soundtrack* Easy to use hint systemXPERIA PLAY OptimizedThis game requests permissions for the following usage:Keeping your phone from sleeping to prevent the screen going blank while playing.Internet access for analytics and improved error reporting (we don't collect private data).Reading phone state to pause the game when you're being called.

reviews.title: More free levels
reviews.comment: Like game, though i can finish in 15 minutes. Needs more free levels.
reviews.author: Phillip Souza

reviews.title: Cute & fun
reviews.comment: I like it! It seems like it will be a challenge but not too frustrating. I like the design and the music. Thanks for the free demo, I like it when devs have faith in their games.
reviews.author: govegg K

reviews.title: Adictive game
reviews.comment: Bought the full version before I even got to the last free level :D   also, I love that there\'s no ads in the free version
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun game!
reviews.comment: Works good on HTC one x, fun game, good job!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: There is just one downside
reviews.comment: After this free version, one wants more...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Very easy to learn, but difficult to win. Puzzles will definitely strain your brain! I can\'t wait for more levels, and hopefully another game like it! Worth purchasing the full game, for sure! In fact, I purchased it for others as well, that\'s how much I love it. A puzzler\'s must have!
reviews.author: Doug Reynolds

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: Interesting gaming levels. More needed to add.
reviews.author: Rajesh Medam

reviews.title: Who doesn\'t love air travel?
reviews.comment: It\'s good to be king. Especially when the kingdom you rule has access to an airship that can take you anywhere. However, it\'s not as easy as it might sound; airships are difficult to control. They just travel in a straight line unless you plunk down a large fan to push them the way you want to go. That\'s the idea behind Kings Can Fly Free, where you must carefully plan out the route you want the zeppelin to take, before letting things go live. There\'s not much more to the game than that, and that\'s fine; simplicity is good. However, I\'d have liked more customization, and perhaps more real-time moving obstacles to plan around. Even without those, however, Kings Can Fly Free is well worth a look. Download it today and get planning. -- via Best Apps Market
reviews.author: Akela Talamasca
